fullDescription.intro:
This node is obsolete! Please use the new Parallel Coordinates located in the Data Views category.
Numerical and nominal data is shown in a parallel coordinate display where axes are depicted in parallel as vertical lines. A vector of the input space is visualized as a line, connecting each attribute's value on each axis. (Fuzzy) Rules are represented by bands, visualizing the corresponding intervals (the core regions in the case of fuzzy rules).

views.view: Displays data points or rules as lines or bands in a 2D plot.
